title: Local Hour: Teach Me Joy
description:
The Miami Dolphins are all in after a flurry of aggressive trade deadline moves, and Witty doesn't know what to do with his hands! Then, why do the Packers refuse to make moves for Aaron Rodgers' offense? And the Heat look to be back on track after a victory over the Warriors, and Amin is here to break down how Bam Adebayo, Duncan Robinson, and zone defense made it happen.
